title: Don’t Mess with a Deadly Revenger [Official]
Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: Daddy President Is Too Hard To Deal With
summary: Rumor has it that the president of the Xi group is weird, unpredictable, insidious and mean of doing things but he spoils her to the maximum. Assistant: “Sir, Madam’s hospital has been smashed.” “Where is madam?” “Madam is about to cripple someone …….” “Let the doctor go to madam to see if her hand hurts from the beating! Love rivals from all over the world: “Xiao Tian Tian, what’s so great about a cold old man! Come with me and I’ll give you everything. President Xi: “Wife,the babies are calling you home for dinner.”

title: The Cop Is Too Strong
summary: Matsumoto Yuu, a systems engineer, was transported to another world along with his pet cat, Orihime. There, he meets Annemarie, an impoverished noblewoman, and decides to help rebuild her territory... Using his programming knowledge and skills, he works hard to restore the land! Moreover, Orihime also gains an incredible power... What will happen next?! The revolutionary fantasy of a development-loving systems engineer begins in grand fashion!

title: The Young Lady’s Secretary
summary:
The servant of the Tendou family, Eito, serves the perfect young lady, Hoshine. 

One day, Eito informs Hoshine that someone from another class confessed their feelings for him. Hoshine, who has hidden her feelings for Eito since childhood, begins to feel uneasy: 

"I’ve loved Eito for a much longer time!"

 As a result, Hoshine starts to approach Eito even more, making bolder advances than ever before! She gets close to him in crowded trains and begs him to sleep by her side… While Eito tries to maintain his role as a formal servant, Hoshine increasingly pursues him with her advances. 

It’s an adorable romantic comedy between a mistress and her servant, featuring a young lady who strives to win her servant’s love!

title: My Pet Miad
Life on the Flower Road of the Grand Duchess
summary:
She was born to received the curse, to disappear. So, she accepted the marriage proposal to be free from her family before she dies but... the hospitality and affection she received from her in-laws are endless and her husband's obsession is mysterious... A flower path unfolds in front of her, who was a time limit!

---
For centuries, the firstborn of House Helsington has been cursed to die young, so the family produces an illegitimate child, Isabella, to take on the curse instead. To get away from her terrible home and live her last days in peace, she wants nothing more than to escape. Her chance comes when Grand Duke Noverdic asks her to marry his son, Cleor. Once she arrives in the north, she is showered with endless affection from both her in-laws and her fiancé... to the point that it's almost suspicious.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%90%EB%B9%84%EC%9D%98-%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%ED%94%84/3270), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59274036)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-isabellas-path-to-happiness/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/108554)

title: Melin’s Salvation Plan
summary:
I suddenly woke up in the body of Melinia, a supporting character and the first love of Male Lead A from "Azuli's Magnificent Misfortune." 

Since I know how this tragic tale ends, I decided to do what I can to stop the ultimate destruction of the kingdom from the male leads. But the more I try to fix things, I can't help but notice that the storyline seems to veer farther away from what I read. 

Will this plan of mine work? Or will it just cause more harm than the original?

title: It’s My First Time Being a Mother Again
summary:
"Please place your seal here, Lady Grint."

"No!"

"Don’t make this harder than it needs to be. Just do it." 

"I said no! Why on earth would I marry you?"

"Then who would you marry, my lady?"

At a distance close enough to feel each other’s breath, Therious Hurt gently raised his index finger and began tracing soft circles over my flat belly. My body stiffened at the strange, indescribable sensation.

"My child is right here. Who do you think you’re marrying if not me?" 

I got dumped by the man I’d loved for 10 years, and in a fit of anger... I slept with his superior!
It was fine up to that point, but what am I supposed to do now?!

title: Werewolves Going Crazy over Me
summary:
A dangerous love affair with a werewolf.
Single mother Olivia finds Damian dying on the streets and takes him home. Before long, the two are sharing a passionate kiss. Damian soon realizes the side effects of the drug suppressing his werewolf instincts vanish when he is with her. Now he must find a way to keep her around, no matter the cost.

title: Reset Life of Regression Police
Cling to me (Please Be Obsessed With Me)
summary: Arabella is a forgotten outcast princess who vomits blood whenever she moves. After being killed during the rebellion against the oppression of the imperial family which inherited the dragon's blood, she returns to the time before her 20th birthday. Realizing that she must survive until her 25th birthday in order to stop the regression cycle, Arabella decides to look for a way to cure her illness, even if it means seeking answers from the rebel forces themselves.

title: I’m tired of Novel Transmigration
summary:
I’ve had enough of being transmigrated into novels.

You would be tired of it too, especially if it was already your fourth time doing it. This time, I became the female lead’s villainous older sister.

‘Oh, I’m so sick of this.’

Yet again, I was sure this life wouldn’t be exciting either. I had led straightforward lives before, and then I died and moved on to the next.

But why was it that this iteration was a tad different?

‘Why can I use the abilities I had in my second transmigration?’

‘Why is the female lead bothering me so much?’

Alicia, this novel’s protagonist, was fated to have a poor, emaciated life. However, considering that she was this novel’s true heroine, I couldn’t just let her roll through the mud like this. I would do everything in my power to change her fate.

‘My younger sister, don’t become the female lead this time.’

To achieve my goal through a project hereby dubbed as the [Mob-Alicia Project], I’ve recruited the male lead’s older brother.

Cassion Carter.

He was the villain who was almost killed—no, was fated to be killed—by the male lead.

“If you want to live, promise me one thing.”

As if he was a wild beast that had been hunted and left to die alone, he breathed with incredible difficulty. I reached toward the poor man’s face and caressed his cheek, leaning down to whisper softly.

“If I save you…”

Lay down your own life on the line to protect my sister.

title: The Ducal Family’s Poisonous Flower
summary:
Lily Roland, the daughter of Duke Roland, stumbled upon her fiancé and her illegitimate sister having an affair! She was poisoned by the two people whom she grew up with, and thrown into the wilderness.

When her life was hanging by a thread, she was saved by a monstrous creature that had a body of a human, but a head of a beast, who turned out to be the Crown Prince, Isaac Stewart.

Isaac was cursed by a mysterious witch to turn into a bloodthirsty monster on the night when the moon is full, and Lily’s blood is his only antidote!

Isaac decides to help Lily in her revenge, but in exchange, she must marry him and assist him in lifting the curse.

title: Disastrous Necromancer
summary:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?

title: Necromancer’s Evolutionary Traits
summary:
After clearing the game Peccata for the twelfth time, Kim Jinhwan finds himself inside its world as Adrias Cromwell, a weak and cowardly character who always ends up dead!

With six months left until he gets killed along with his master for practicing forbidden magic, Adrias starts training and gathering corpses to better his necromancy, determined to survive. 

But will this long-time gamer's necromancy skills and pre-existing knowledge be enough to change the sequence of events?

title: Standard of Reincarnation
summary:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.

title: Melody of the Deadwood
summary:
Collection of short stories:  
  
1) Crescendo  
Kazune, Yuzuru and Yanna loved the band "Crescent" and were inseperable. Then Yanna reveals she loves Yuzuru and Kazune cheers her on. Kazune discovers her family is moving away. And Yuzuru calls Kazune to ask if she'd like to go with him to a "Crescent" concert…  
  
2) Mousou Reijou  
Nene has inhired a special gift to turn the "beautiful" scenes in her head into reality. Only the one she loves with all her heart can help her control it. One day she gets dropped in front of Tatsumis house, the boy she loves. He has to take care of her from now on…  
  
3) Kokoro Prism  
Haircut, makeup and contact lenses. The new me. Nahi uses her day off from cram school to go to the beach as a different person. Her classmates don't recognize her. Beach bums try to pick her up. She's saved by a mysterious boy named Yoh who says, "Don't I know you from somewhere…?"  
  
4) Link - Kimi no Tenohira  
Miyuu was devastated when she saw her boyfriend kiss another girl. When she slaps her hands against the mirror in her room, it changes scene and she's staring into the face of a strange boy…  
  
5) Synchronized Night  
Like the other girls in her class Remu relies on her dreams to predict her future. Her latest dream predicts success in love–and classmate Mamoru blurts out he had the same dream! In eerie succession his dreams match hers. But then her dreams have her pursued by a dark figure. Is it Mamoru? Does he have the same dream?

title: 108 Women
As a Reincarnated Villainess and a Single Mother, I’ve Secured the Love Route!
The Maid and Her Favorite King of Darkness
Best Actor in a Relationship Award
summary: Ji-eun, an aspiring director attending the nation's top art school. Ji-eun, who is unknown, wants to cast Jae-ha, the top student in the acting department, to make her work successful and make a name for herself at school. On the other hand, Jae-ha proposes a romantic relationship to Ji-eun in order to get rid of a senior he dislikes. Ji-eun, who is fooled by the acting genius, wants to complete both her school life and her love life. Will she be able to kill two birds with one stone?

title: The Youngest Son of the Eunhae Merchant Group
summary:
The youngest son of the Eunhae Merchant Group.

Eun Seoho was born with an unmatched talent for business.

"Why is the Martial Alliance after me...?"
"They say the higher-ups in the Alliance found you bothersome. All because of your money."

Killed by the sword of the so-called righteous Martial Alliance, I suddenly return to the day I first began learning the trade. This time, I swear I won't live with any regrets.

"I'll bring you down with the money you looked down on."

Armed with a genius mind and exceptional martial arts skills, the legendary journey of Eun Seoho, the graetest Merchant Emperor in history, begins!

title: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
summary: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title: The Most Handsome Man Becomes a Skeleton
summary: In a world where even monsters can't resist his charm, Louis, the most handsome man alive, faces an unexpected twist of fate. One day, a deadly plague sweeps through his village, claiming Louis as one of its victims. However, upon his death, he exclaims, "Where did my sculpted face go? What's with this skeleton head?!" Now, as the strongest and most handsome man in the world-stripped of both beauty and ugliness-Louis embarks on a journey filled with trials and tribulations as a skeleton. Will Louis be able to reclaim his human form and return to his life as the world's most handsome man?

title: Entomologist In Sichuan Tang Clan
summary: Fabre, a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures, is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise, the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan, the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""

title: What Happens When the Second Male Lead Goes on Strike
summary:
When Yeseo Jung wakes up one day, he finds himself trapped inside the body of Jesse Venetiaan, the ill-fated second male lead of a mega-hit fantasy romance novel *I Quit My Job, Then I Became the Princess Bride*.

It turns out this second male lead is destined to die at war, trying to protect the male lead. Yeseo’s goal is to avoid getting entangled with the main characters and survive until the war is over, all while searching for a way to return home safe and sound. 

But the female lead, Christelle, and the male lead, Cedric, keep approaching him…

---

**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://ridibooks.com/books/425193499), [Volumes](https://ridibooks.com/books/425233591)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9174594), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=803518)

title: Until the Soul of the Fallen Queen Knows Love
summary:
Liaris has been mistreated as an 'incompetent person by everyone,including her family,all her life
But one day,she awakened her psychic powers,along with the memory of her previous life as a
queen.'If people were to find out about this power,they'll use me as they did in my previous life,
and I'll have an unhappy future again."Thinking this,Liaris decided to hide her ability and live
quietly as a helpless daughter.But when Edward,the sixth prince,learns of her secret,he asks her
to become his fiancee.Once more,Liaris is taken to the stage of the throne succession that will
shake the country.A romance fantasy about a strong daughter who wants to live quietly in a
peaceful world,and a lonely prince who wants to change the discriminatory world brought about
by his unusual powers.

title: I Won’t Forgive My Stepsister This Time Around!
Your Majesty, I Will Raise Him This Time!
summary: "Who would have thought that the day would come when I would be killed by my own son..." Empress Dahlia of the Empire is killed by her son’s rebellion. Dahlia, who has been kept in the dark finds it difficult to comprehend the drastic change of her son. "I’ll accept any punishment. Please, give me one more chance to face that child...!" Dahlia, having turned back time, need to face her strict husband, Klaus, in order to restore their already severed parent-child relationship. Can she use this opportunity to redo the parenting and avoid the worst future?

title: Reincarnation Of The Heavenly Demon
summary:
In an ancient world where martial artists reign supreme, Unseong can only watch as his master is brutally beaten to death after a false accusation of practicing forbidden demonic arts. Even after a valiant fight, he fails to kill those responsible and faces his own end. But fate has other plans… Instead of taking his last breath, he awakens as a child, training to be an elite soldier of a demonic sect. Now Unseong must embrace the demonic arts and harness power in his ultimate quest for revenge.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Ap-KOIYUqw) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8bRXNwJojI) | [CN](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrTrHgv5ndc)  | [TW](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iN_NifT0mvI)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26650)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/chroniques-demoniaques)

title: Offering Salted Fish To Master
The Ugly Lady’s Secret Pouch
summary:
When Yunseol wakes up as "Laila el Este" in the novel, “Bird Cage,” she is horrified.

Though Laila may be beautiful, her beauty is the reason the three male leads obsess over her and make her life a living hell. As such, Laila decides to use her professional makeup skills to become high society’s infamous ugly duckling.

But out of nowhere, she receives a marriage proposal from Duke Montefeltra, a fellow outcast who is ostracized for his unattractive looks.

Will this turn of events help Laila escape the novel’s bad ending once and for all?

title: My Body Has Been Possessed By Someone
summary: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new life—a loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.

title: Honey, I Think That’s a Misunderstanding
summary: A noblewoman preparing for a political marriage keeps fainting in terror whenever she meets her intimidating fiancé—but he mistakes her fear for affection. Determined to call off the engagement, she must navigate his unexpected romanticism and family secrets.

title: Enough with the Flirting
summary:
Upon opening my eyes after a bus accident, I found myself in the fantasy world of a web novel I enjoyed reading… the only catch is, I reincarnated twenty years before the novel begins! Reborn as Princess Yerenica of the small Lebovny kingdom, I'm determined to change the future in order to prevent the series of unfortunate events that will soon occur. In the original story, my older sister, Tejavia, is pregnant with the future female lead, when she's suddenly kidnapped by the Belgoat Empire's emperor. But in my desperate attempts to protect her, I got kidnapped instead! And as if that wasn't bad enough, my body is ridiculously weak to magic. But… strangely enough, whenever I'm by the emperor, I feel fine! The only way to save the emperor, who's destined to die at the hands of his own son after marrying the villainess, and save myself from being afflicted by magic… is for us to marry!  
  
"Marry me, Father."  
  
"'Father?' Princess, I haven't married yet, nor do I have any kids…"  


---

title: The Stars And I
summary:
Louise is a noble lady who loves books and magic devices. One day, she suddenly had her fiancé stolen by the very same twin sister she was acting as. After her dream to be a magic device researcher was destroyed, the one to save her was her first love, the First Prince Lucius, whom she was able to meet again! From a book club in a secret library to outings to magic device shops, Louise manages to regain the light in her eyes with the time they spend together. With her feeling her heart beat from Lucius's sweet words, just when you'd think they'd get together in no time, the past that the 'substitute lady' doesn't want to be known becomes an obstacle. 

“What do you think about this?”
(No... I couldn't possibly tell him about that.)

On the other hand, Louise’s potential as a researcher is also starting to bloom...?

---
Louise, a noble lady who loves reading and researching magic tools, leads a double life pretending to be her twin sister. Suddenly one day, her fiancé breaks off their engagement and chooses to be with her sister instead. All seems lost to her when she also has to give up her dream of becoming a magic tool researcher, but a reunion with her first love, the first prince Lucius, saves her from her misery. As they spend time together reading books in the hidden archives and looking around at different magic tool shops, Louise slowly regains her confidence. On top of that, her heart flutters every time unconsciously sweet words leave the prince's mouth. The mood is perfect and it seems like it's seconds before they can finally be together, but the past she wants to keep hidden gets in the way.

"How...do you feel about me?"
(He asks, but... I can't do it. I can't tell him.)

Meanwhile, her potential as a researcher begins to blossom and leads to... A true love fantasy full of misunderstandings between a magic tool-obsessed noble lady and a stoic older prince awaits!

title: Guardian of Past and Present
A Love Hate Chord
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: I Became the Adopted Daughter of the Sea Guardian
I Became a Miserable Extra in a Healing-Genre Novel
The Nerd Turned Out to Be the Tyrant
summary: Kanae Yano, a 28-year-old single woman with no boyfriend, is suddenly summoned to another world. There, she encounters Rita Scryne, the duke's daughter who looks exactly like her, and Rita's father, Zack. They ask her to take Rita's place in an arranged marriage with the ruthless and feared King Eugene Astaroth—known as the "Merciless Wolf." Upon learning that the summoning magic can bring people from another world but cannot send them back, Kanae finds herself with no choice but to accept. However, when she meets King Eugene, she makes a shocking discovery—his true identity is none other than her first love!

title: Look-Alike Daughter
summary: Beautiful and intelligent, Somyung Gil has tirelessly strived to fulfill her mother's vision of the perfect daughter. However, when her less-than-perfect younger brother is tragically found drowned in a river, doubts plague Somyung's heart. She begins to suspect that their mother might be responsible for the unspeakable act. From then on, her paramount goal becomes escaping her mother's grasp, while all her mother wants is for Somyung to experience the perfect life she herself was denied. Will Somyung ever truly find her freedom?

title: Living As A Madman’s Sweet Wife
summary: [Original Web Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3629814)

title: The Duke’s Daughter Will Not Forgive Anymore
The Beastly Count After Dark
summary:
One day, veterinary doctor Zeke is suddenly fired by the king, leaving him with nowhere to go but at a loss. However, after helping a divine beast, he is invited to the beast kingdom with excellent treatment. 

After Zeke is banished, the kingdom begins to decline, but he begins living happily surrounded by cute animal-eared girls. 

From Let's Become a Novelist! comes the long-awaited comic adaptation of the hugely popular harem slow life packed with fluffy and cute animal-eared girls!

(Source: Bookwalker)

title: The Law of Hunting for the Immortal King
summary: Five years ago, the male protagonist’s brother defeated the hidden boss subspecies of the fairy king in the game “The World of the Immortal King”, and then disappeared from the world. When the family gave up looking for his brother, it was only five years for the male protagonist to realize that all this might be related to the game, and for five years, he insisted on

title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
summary: Kanae Yano, a 28-year-old single woman with no boyfriend, is suddenly summoned to another world. There, she encounters Rita Scryne, the duke's daughter who looks exactly like her, and Rita's father, Zack. They ask her to take Rita's place in an arranged marriage with the ruthless and feared King Eugene Astaroth—known as the "Merciless Wolf." Upon learning that the summoning magic can bring people from another world but cannot send them back, Kanae finds herself with no choice but to accept. However, when she meets King Eugene, she makes a shocking discovery—his true identity is none other than her first love!

title: The Cursed Princess Must Rewind the Clock
